bill.title: Retirement; school districts may pay health insurance premium of retirees employed as school bus drivers.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize Public School Districts To Pay With Local Funds The Full Cost Of The Health Insurance Premiums For Retired Members Of The Public Employees' Retirement System Who Are Employed As School Bus Drivers By The School Districts; To Amend Section 25-11-127, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Any Retiree, Regardless Of Age, To Be Employed By A Public School District As A School Bus Driver And Draw A Retirement Allowance From The Public Employees' Retirement System If The Annual Compensation For Such Employment Does Not Exceed $10,000.00 Per Year; And For Related Purposes.
